    • login

      @RequestMapping(value="", method=GET) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<String>> login(@RequestParam(required=false) String mission)
      Let a user log in to a specific mission (the user is retrieved from the basic authentication information). Mission may be empty for the "root" user.
